title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Came across this in last gitcoin grants round and just gave it a try. Don't understand some stuff but leisurely uploaded content, locked it with random token - it works. Content is TLS encrypted. Supports most famous file types, token/nft gated wallet sharing. Files are ipfs stored. If you want to try: https://beta.fileverse.ioTwitter: https://nitter.kavin.rocks/fileverseio

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: There have been multiple projects on the same space in the past and all of them failed miserably. So if you are thinking of investing, refrain from doing so. Such kind of projects would only make sense if suddenly Google or Microsoft stops providing free clould storage. But now, such kind of secured and encrypted storage has a very very limited market and coupl3 of established enterprise level players.Â So the future prospect of such projects are not that shiney. So don't invest a dime here.
